params.setter: Address of the account that has potentially whitelisted `requester` for the `airnode`–`endpointId` pair indefinitely

returns.indefiniteWhitelistStatus: If `setter` has indefinitely whitelisted `requester` for the `airnode`–`endpointId` pair

returns.expirationTimestamp: Timestamp at which the temporary whitelist will expire
returns.indefiniteWhitelistCount: Number of times `requester` was whitelisted indefinitely for the `airnode`–`endpointId` pair

params.expirationTimestamp: Timestamp at which the temporary whitelist will expire

isAuthorized(bytes32,address,bytes32,add.details: This method has redundant arguments because all authorizer contracts have to have the same interface and potential authorizer contracts may require to access the arguments that are redundant here

returns.isWhitelisted: If `requester` is whitelisted for the `airnode`–`endpointId` pair

params.setter: Setter of the indefinite whitelist status

params.expirationTimestamp: Timestamp at which the temporary whitelist will expire

devdoc.title: Authorizer contract that Airnodes can use to temporarily or indefinitely whitelist requesters for Airnode–endpoint pairs

accessControlRegistry().notice: Address of the AccessControlRegistry contract that keeps the roles

airnodeToEndpointIdToRequesterToSetterTo.notice: Returns if an account has indefinitely whitelisted `requester` for the `airnode`–`endpointId` pair

airnodeToEndpointIdToRequesterToWhitelis.notice: Returns the whitelist status of `requester` for the `airnode`–`endpointId` pair

deriveAdminRole(address).notice: Derives the admin role for the specific Airnode address

deriveIndefiniteWhitelisterRole(address).notice: Derives the indefinite whitelister role for the specific Airnode address

deriveWhitelistExpirationExtenderRole(ad.notice: Derives the whitelist expiration extender role for the specific Airnode address

deriveWhitelistExpirationSetterRole(addr.notice: Derives the whitelist expiration setter role for the specific Airnode address

extendWhitelistExpiration(address,bytes3.notice: Extends the expiration of the temporary whitelist of `requester` for the `airnode`–`endpointId` pair if the sender has the whitelist expiration extender role

isAuthorized(bytes32,address,bytes32,add.notice: Verifies the authorization status of a request

requesterIsWhitelisted(address,bytes32,a.notice: Returns if `requester` is whitelisted for the `airnode`–`endpointId` pair

revokeIndefiniteWhitelistStatus(address,.notice: Revokes the indefinite whitelist status granted by a specific account that no longer has the indefinite whitelister role

setIndefiniteWhitelistStatus(address,byt.notice: Sets the indefinite whitelist status of `requester` for the `airnode`–`endpointId` pair if the sender has the indefinite whitelister role

setWhitelistExpiration(address,bytes32,a.notice: Sets the expiration of the temporary whitelist of `requester` for the `airnode`–`endpointId` pair if the sender has the whitelist expiration setter role
